2006 NBA Playoffs Summary

2005 Playoffs Summary 2007 Playoffs Summary

League Champion: Miami Heat

Finals MVP: Dwyane Wade (34.7 / 7.8 / 3.8)


2006 Playoff Leaders:

PTS: Dwyane Wade (654)

TRB: Dirk Nowitzki (268)

AST: Steve Nash (204)

WS: Dirk Nowitzki (5.4)
